Reviews.Title: “BEWARE, bait and switch, do not honor their word”

Reviews.Content: visited turkey rod run november 25th originally booked 2 nights expedia learned unable stay night called expedia called hotel changed reservation night manager nina patel pay 25 change fee ok expedia informed call saty refund night friday evening giving manager expedia paperwork saturday morning person lobby lady checked am presuming manager check replied left hotel returning night planned hotel manager refuses refund night saying check correctly directly fault record reservation change expedia phone effectively calling liar recommend note friends hotel charged 30 quoted phone booked
